original_text: I sent you to reap what you have not worked for. Others have done the hard work, and you have reaped the benefits of their labor.”
korean_text: 내가 너희로 노력하지 아니한 것을 거두러 보내었노니 다른 사람들은 노력하였고 너희는 그들이 노력한 것에 참여하였느니라

sentences.original_text: what you have not worked for
Others have done the hard work
and you have reaped the benefits of their labor
